title: Ax-wielding Adventurer Harem Story - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Seinen
tags: Adventurers   Animal Characteristics   Calm Protagonist   Demi-Humans   Determined Protagonist   Early Romance   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Heroes   Male Protagonist   Polygamy   R-18   Strong to Stronger   Unique Weapon User
author: Ikapon   いかぽん
description: Douglas is an adventurer who uses an axe as a weapon, a very serious and hard-working man who has lived an unrewarding life. One day he is betrayed by his teammates in the depths of a dungeon, and almost loses his life. In the midst of his despair, he finds an axe, a fearsome weapon with mythical power. After this great find, his life changes drastically from that day on. He becomes a man loved and adored by three beautiful girls. The forty year old adventurer begins a journey to become a hero to be envied by all.>
